planned_area_source: As per copy of gram panchayat plan
area_comments: As per the sale deed and gram panchayat plan, the planned built-up area is 1,496 sft, but as per physical verification and the sale deed, the actual built-up area is 2,100 sft, indicating a deviation of 40.4%. The deviation is not acceptable as per standard norms.
occupancy_comments: Based on documents and contact information, the property is self-occupied by the owner RAMU GANGINENI.
construction_comments: The property is fully constructed and ready to occupy.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Sale deed, tax receipt, electricity bill, gram panchayat plan, valuation initiation letter
valuer_comments:
- The subject property is a residential independent house (RCC structure) in Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District.
- As per the copy of sale deed and gram panchayat plan, the land area is 134 sq yd (1,206 sft) and the planned built-up area is 1,496 sft.
- Actual built-up area as measured and as per sale deed is 2,100 sft (Ground + First Floor).
- Valuation is based on comparable method, referencing registered sale deeds of similar properties in Green Villas.
- The property includes typical amenities for an independent house. No specific fixed furniture or value-added amenities are documented.
- The property is self-occupied and in good condition, both interior and exterior.
- No negative area features are present; the residential colony is well-developed.
- Deviation in area is 40.4% between planned and actual, which is not standard-acceptable.
- The property is not in a protected or regulated area as per provided documentation.
- Assumption is made that the title is clear and all necessary permissions are in place.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 10 July 2025 is INR 7,500,000/- and the value of amenities as on 10 July 2025 is INR NA/- taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
